properties.entry: SELECT REST_NO , REST_NAME , REST_ADDRESS , REST_PHONE , PARKING , INTRO , REST_VIEWS , OPENING_TIME , REST_TIME , BREAK_TIME FROM RESTAURANT JOIN OPEN_TIME USING (REST_NO) WHERE REST_NO = ?
SELECT REST_NO , FILE_NO , MENU , TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') PRICE , MENU_GRADE FROM MENU WHERE REST_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM FAVORITES WHERE REST_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM REVIEW WHERE REST_NO = ?
SELECT AVG(RATING) avg FROM REVIEW JOIN RESTAURANT USING (REST_NO) WHERE REST_NO = ?
